name: Running John: Escape from The Heat-wave
name_original: Running John: Escape from The Heat-wave
description:
Heatwave is coming! High temperature isn’t the only variable that can form killer heatwave.

Run for your life to stay alive. However, keep running is endless. Can you ‘tame’ the heatwave instead without getting burnt by it? How far do you need to run before successfully ‘taming’ the heatwave? Share your score on the comment below - the shorter the distance, the better it is ;)

 

Hope you enjoy the game (prototype), and feel free to share your thoughts and experience when playing the game.

 

PS: Could you find the juxtaposition element in the game? ;)

Side note: the game represents our perspective towards heatwave – something we never encounter – in real life. It’s also our first time in creating art assets.
